title: My Moment: 106 Women on Fighting for Themselves
description: This empowering collection of inspirational essays from some of today’s most powerful women in media, entertainment, academia, and sports explores a crucial question: What was the moment you realized you were ready to fight for yourself? Featuring stunning black and white photography and contributions from figures as varied and acclaimed as Joanna Gaines, Soledad O’Brien, Gloria Steinem, and many more.
author: Kristen Chenoweth
